jd: Hello ,My name is Gurdeep Singh and I am a Staffing Specialist at Sibitalent. I am reaching out to you on an exciting job opportunity with one of our client Title - Azure Cloud ArchitectsVisa :: No H1b/CPT/OPTLocation :: Hybrid onsite in Wilmington, DE 3 days/ weekDuration :: 6 months Experience :: 10+ years Note:- Need local and strong candidate Description:- Required Skills and Experience *10+ years of experience in Azure Architecture- Strong experience with cloud solutions related to optimization, design, and implementation- Strong understanding of Microsoft technologies and platforms (staying up to date with the latest innovations within Azure and it's offerings)- Experience working in a large, global, highly matrixed environment- Excellent communication skills with the proven ability to work with technical and functional teams along with 3rd party outsourcing providers- Ability to adapt to a fast-paced environment with ongoing, changing priorities Nice to Have Skills and Experience- Experience with automation and gen AI initiatives within a cloud environment- Azure certifications (Azure AI, Architecture, etc.) Job Description *A global manufacturing company is seeking a highly skilled Azure Cloud Architect to join their team! As a part of their enterprise technology organization, this individual will be responsible for both ongoing BAU work as well as existing and new project initiatives related to the design, architecture, solution delivery, and engineering for their Azure cloud platform. The ideal candidate should have extensive, in-depth knowledge of Azure, should have proven experience developing solutions related to the Azure platform, and previous experience working within, or consulting for, large, global, highly-matrixed organizations. Additionally, this individual should be able to work both independently and with cross-functional teams and 3rd party vendors, have strong communication skills, and the ability to adapt to a fast paced environment. This is an immediate need for a 6 month contract with the possibilities of extensions and this individual will be required to be onsite in Wilmington, DE 3 days/ week.
